name: Casino New Mexico
description:
• I fully coded the game in java script during game jam (my first time using js)
  • the graphics were made by me and my friend during the jam
  • music and sound effects are royalty free

I joined this game jam hoping that the deadline will force me to make something and to finally learn java script. I didn't even expect to finish, but my plan ended up working and I also created a game I am proud of. Hope you enjoy playing as much as I enjoyed making it.
